column39: If 'true', workflow instances is not terminated when there are no active execution paths. Instance can be terminated via 'terminate end definition' or reaching defined 'workflowExecTimeout'
column45: If set to true, actions should automatically be retried on unchecked errors. Default is false
column56: Amount of time (ISO 8601 duration format) to sleep before function/subflow invocation. Does not apply if 'eventRef' is defined.
column58: Amount of time (ISO 8601 duration format) to sleep after function/subflow invocation. Does not apply if 'eventRef' is defined.
